divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home down State Route 72, from my Fiance's house when a Green diamond shaped light streaked across the sky. I would've attributed it to a comet or something, but it seemed too close to the Earth. It mosed faster than a plane. I immediately got excited and called my fiance to let her know. She then told me she had seen a program on the discovery program about people seeing these things and I got excited and decided to inform MUFON. It isn't the first time I've seen this phenomenon. This is the fifth. First time writing about it. Over a span of about 8 months I've seen multicolored flares standing still then disapearing, or streaking. I've seen blue, green and orange.
Summary: A green diamond shaped light streaked across the sky, flared and disapeared.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Leesburg
There were no other sightings in Leesburg on or around October 19th 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
